price: 30. Or do they say: "(Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم) is a poet! We await for him some calamity by time!"
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
